abstract: A federal judge in Minneapolis gave the go-ahead to a class-action lawsuit against UnitedHealth Group and its former chairman and chief executive.
snippet: A federal judge in Minneapolis gave the go-ahead to a class-action lawsuit against UnitedHealth Group and its former chairman and chief executive.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Minneapolis made a tart comparison when he gave the go-ahead last week to a class-action lawsuit against the giant insurer UnitedHealth Group and William W. McGuire, its former chairman and chief executive.

headline.main: In the Same Breath as a Screen Classic
headline.print_headline: In the Same Breath As a Screen Classic
